Uses of Interface
org.firmata4j.fsm.State

Packages that use State
Package
Description
org.firmata4j.firmata.parser
 
org.firmata4j.fsm
 

  • Uses of State in org.firmata4j.firmata.parser

    Classes in org.firmata4j.firmata.parser that implement State
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ParsingAnalogMappingState
    This state parses analog mapping message and fires an event that contains information about how the analog ports match to the pin indexes.
    After receiving the last byte, the state transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
    class 
    ParsingAnalogMessageState
    This state parses the analog message that points an analog input has changed.
    The analog message consists of three bytes: first contains four bits of a command and four bits with port id; second and third contains current value of port.
    After receiving the last byte, the state fires an event to FSM and transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
    class 
    ParsingCapabilityResponseState
    This state parses capability response and fires an event that contains information about pins and their supported modes.
    After receiving the last byte, the state transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
    class 
    ParsingCustomSysexMessageState
    This state collects raw binary data until it receives SYSEX_END message and publishes it as a SYSEX_CUSTOM_MESSAGE event.
    class 
    ParsingDigitalMessageState
    This state parses digital message and fires an event that contains information about the state of each pin of the port where state of at least one pin has changed.
    After receiving the last byte, the state transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
    When digital input of particular pin has been changed, Firmata transmits state of whole port the pin is contained in.
    A port is a set of 8 pins.
    class 
    ParsingExtendedAnalogMessageState
    This state parses extended analog state message and fires an event that contains information about the state of an analog input where the state has changed.
    This kind of message is received when pin id of the analog input is greater than 15 and/or value on the input is greater than 16383.
    After receiving the last byte of the message, the state transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
    class 
    ParsingFirmwareMessageState
    This state parses firmware message and fires an event that contains the name and version of firmware.
    After receiving the last byte of the message, the state transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
    class 
    ParsingI2CMessageState
    This class parses inbound I2C messages and publishes them when they are complete.
    class 
    ParsingStringMessageState
     
    class 
    ParsingSysexMessageState
    This state parses type of sysex message and transfers FSM to the state which is able to handle the message.
    If the state receives unknown type of sysex message, it transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
    class 
    ParsingVersionMessageState
    This state parses version report message that contains the version of the protocol the hardware supports.
    class 
    PinStateParsingState
    This state parses the pin state message.
    After receiving the last byte of the message, the state transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
    class 
    WaitingForMessageState
    This is initial default state of FirmataDevice.
    The state is waiting for command and determines to which state transfers to parse further data.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractState
    This state stores FSM it belongs to.

    Description

    FiniteStateMachine.getCurrentState()
    Returns current state of the FSM.

    Method
    Description
    void
    FiniteStateMachine.transitTo(State state)
    Transfers the FSM to the new state.
    Method parameters in org.firmata4j.fsm with type arguments of type State
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    FiniteStateMachine.transitTo(Class<? extends State> stateClass)
    Transfers the FSM to the new state of the specified class.
    This method takes only classes that provide a constructor taking a FiniteStateMachine instance as a parameter.
    Constructor parameters in org.firmata4j.fsm with type arguments of type State
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    FiniteStateMachine(Class<? extends State> stateClass)
    Constructs the finite state machine in the state of the specified class.
